trans-unit.source: Defines the reader, writer, and methods for pre-generated, typed serializers.
trans-unit.target: 定义的预生成的类型化序列化的读取器、 编写器和方法。

trans-unit.source: To improve the performance of XML serialization, you can generate assemblies before serialization using the [XML Serializer Generator Tool (Sgen.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要提高 XML 序列化的性能，则可以序列化使用之前生成程序集[XML 序列化程序生成器工具 (Sgen.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When such an assembly is loaded, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> uses the properties of the XmlSerializerImplementation interface to query the contained serializer or serializers.
trans-unit.target: 当此类程序集的加载，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>的 XmlSerializerImplementation 接口的属性用于查询包含序列化程序或序列化程序。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerImplementation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerImplementation"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether a type can be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，确定是否可以序列化类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>要序列化。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the type can be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果类型可以序列化;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a serializer for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定类型的序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>要序列化。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An instance of a type derived from the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: 派生自<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>类</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>类型的实例

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML reader object that is used by the serializer.
trans-unit.target: 获取序列化程序使用的 XML 读取器对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader"></xref> that is used to read an XML document or data stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader"> </xref>用于读取 XML 文档或数据流。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of methods that is used to read a data stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于读取数据流的方法的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that contains the methods.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>包含的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of typed serializers that is found in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取在程序集中找到的类型化序列化程序的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that contains the typed serializers.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>包含类型化序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: Get the collection of methods that is used to write to a data stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于写入数据流的方法的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that contains the methods.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>包含的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML writer object for the serializer.
trans-unit.target: 获取序列化程序的 XML 编写器对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter"></xref> that is used to write to an XML data stream or document.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter"> </xref>用于写入 XML 数据的流或文档。
